title: Invaders (Android Wear)
summary: The Best Space Invaders game for Android Wear!
description: Note: the game has been replaced by newer Invaders 2 and no longer maintained. You can download Invaders 2 from the watch Play store.Check out the new Invaders 2! • wrist control• improved game play!• sound and vibration effects• compatible with Android Wear 1 and 2 devices• Samsung Gear S2/S3/Sport users please download from Samsung Galaxy Apps store!GAME DESCRIPTION• Tap to move spaceship and fire.• Destroy all aliens before they reached ground.• Spaceship can takes 2 extra hits before destroyed.More Android Wear games:• Space War: Best arcade game for Android Wear.• GALAXIA: Space Invaders meet Galaxian.• Invaders Watch: Space Invaders watch faces.
descriptionHTML:
Note: the game has been replaced by newer Invaders 2 and no longer maintained. You can download Invaders 2 from the watch Play store.

Check out the new Invaders 2!
• wrist control
• improved game play!
• sound and vibration effects
• compatible with Android Wear 1 and 2 devices
• Samsung Gear S2/S3/Sport users please download from Samsung Galaxy Apps store!

GAME DESCRIPTION
• Tap to move spaceship and fire.
• Destroy all aliens before they reached ground.
• Spaceship can takes 2 extra hits before destroyed.

More Android Wear games:
• Space War: Best arcade game for Android Wear.
• GALAXIA: Space Invaders meet Galaxian.
• Invaders Watch: Space Invaders watch faces.
comments: Awesome. Left edge of screen go left, right edge of screen go right,  middle of screen stop and shoot.  I'm playing space invaders on my watch.
Can't give proper review as it doesn't work. Downloaded but went on phone and won't transfer to watch :| running s8 and gear 3
Huh It won't download when I turn on Bluetooth and does it work for the dz09 smartwatch? Do I need a sim card? HOW DO I USE THIS!?!?  :-(
Soon as I start the game the Invaders drop to the bottom of the screen killing me. Fossil Q 3rd gen.  Unplayable.
Space invaders for watch. Cool little game
It's terrible doesn't work for the gt08 Bluetooth smartwatch
recentChanges: Introducing Invaders 2 - more features, wrist control! Download from Google Play now!
